Class CustomClass.CaseEmailInfo

public class CustomClass.CaseEmailInfo

Stores data from a case and a related email Case info: caseId, caseNumber, subject, ownerId Email info: fromAddress, fromName

public String getFromNameOrAddress()


Returns:
    [String] fromName if not blank, otherwise fromAddress

public String getFromNameWithAddress()


Returns:
    [String] fromName with fromAddress, i.e.: "fromName (fromAddress)", or "fromAddress" if blank fromName
